job_details.Vacaturetitel: Full Stack Engineer, 2 Hour Learning (Remote) - $100,000/year USD
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
This is not a position for those who prefer to specialize in a single aspect of development. We're looking for innovative thinkers who can seamlessly integrate AI across both front-end and back-end systems, taking ownership of the entire product. Your work will directly impact thousands of students, ensuring that our tools meet their needs and set new standards for educational technology., * Develop AI-Powered Web Applications: Architect and code sophisticated web applications that integrate both front-end and back-end components, with a focus on enhancing user experience through AI.
     * Experiment and Innovate with AI: Work with cutting-edge AI technologies, specifically large language models (LLMs) like GPT-4 or Claude, to create autonomous tools and interactive features that redefine how students learn.
     * Drive Technical Projects: Take ownership of the entire development process, from gathering requirements to launching and iterating on products. You'll work closely with stakeholders to ensure that our solutions meet learner needs and push the boundaries of what's possible.
     * Collaborate and Communicate: Partner with a global team of developers, designers, and educational experts. Your ability to communicate complex ideas simply and effectively will be key to your success.
     * Continuous Improvement: Stay ahead of the curve by continually learning and applying the latest advancements in AI and web development to our platform.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Narrow AI Development: You won't be working on isolated AI features that don't integrate with the overall product strategy. Your work will have a direct impact on thousands of students.
     * Surface-Level Coding: This is not a role for those who focus only on either front-end or back-end development. You will be expected to integrate both, creating comprehensive and scalable solutions.
     * Routine Maintenance: This role is not about maintaining legacy systems or making minor updates. You will be driving innovation and building new, cutting-edge applications.
     * Waiting for Detailed Specifications: You won't be handed fully fleshed-out requirements. Instead, you will take high-level ideas and translate them into fully developed products, leveraging your expertise in AI and full-stack development.
     * Working in Isolation: You won't be coding in a vacuum. Collaboration with other developers, product managers, and educational experts is key to ensuring that the solutions you build are impactful and user-centered., Develop and deliver engaging, human-centered AI applications that demonstrably accelerate learning outcomes and efficiency for thousands of K-12 students.
job_details.full_text:
Full Stack Engineer, 2 Hour Learning (Remote) - $100,000/year USD

This is not a position for those who prefer to specialize in a single aspect of development. We're looking for innovative thinkers who can seamlessly integrate AI across both front-end and back-end systems, taking ownership of the entire product. Your work will directly impact thousands of students, ensuring that our tools meet their needs and set new standards for educational technology., * Develop AI-Powered Web Applications: Architect and code sophisticated web applications that integrate both front-end and back-end components, with a focus on enhancing user experience through AI.
     * Experiment and Innovate with AI: Work with cutting-edge AI technologies, specifically large language models (LLMs) like GPT-4 or Claude, to create autonomous tools and interactive features that redefine how students learn.
     * Drive Technical Projects: Take ownership of the entire development process, from gathering requirements to launching and iterating on products. You'll work closely with stakeholders to ensure that our solutions meet learner needs and push the boundaries of what's possible.
     * Collaborate and Communicate: Partner with a global team of developers, designers, and educational experts. Your ability to communicate complex ideas simply and effectively will be key to your success.
     * Continuous Improvement: Stay ahead of the curve by continually learning and applying the latest advancements in AI and web development to our platform.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Narrow AI Development: You won't be working on isolated AI features that don't integrate with the overall product strategy. Your work will have a direct impact on thousands of students.
     * Surface-Level Coding: This is not a role for those who focus only on either front-end or back-end development. You will be expected to integrate both, creating comprehensive and scalable solutions.
     * Routine Maintenance: This role is not about maintaining legacy systems or making minor updates. You will be driving innovation and building new, cutting-edge applications.
     * Waiting for Detailed Specifications: You won't be handed fully fleshed-out requirements. Instead, you will take high-level ideas and translate them into fully developed products, leveraging your expertise in AI and full-stack development.
     * Working in Isolation: You won't be coding in a vacuum. Collaboration with other developers, product managers, and educational experts is key to ensuring that the solutions you build are impactful and user-centered., Develop and deliver engaging, human-centered AI applications that demonstrably accelerate learning outcomes and efficiency for thousands of K-12 students.

job_profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the development and integration of AI, specifically LLMs like GPT-4 and Claude, into user-facing web applications. It highlights building autonomous tools and interactive features, aligning with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer focused on language and interaction specialists.

phrases: Full Stack Engineer
seamlessly integrate AI across both front-end and back-end systems
Architect and code sophisticated web applications that integrate both front-end and back-end components
building and maintaining production-grade security-aware user-facing software systems
Develop and deliver engaging, human-centered AI applications
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate a focus on building complete applications, integrating AI into both user interfaces and server-side logic, and creating production-ready software.

phrases: Experiment and Innovate with AI
large language models (LLMs) like GPT-4 or Claude
create autonomous tools and interactive features
Narrow AI Development: You won't be working on isolated AI features
leveraging your expertise in AI
job_tasks.justification: The description explicitly mentions working with LLMs, fine-tuning, and developing AI-driven features, which falls under the modeling category, particularly generative AI.

phrases: taking ownership of the entire product
Drive Technical Projects: Take ownership of the entire development process, from gathering requirements to launching and iterating on products
building new, cutting-edge applications
take full responsibility for the quality and success of one's work
job_tasks.justification: Phrases related to ownership of the full development lifecycle, launching, iterating, and building new applications suggest involvement in productionizing and maintaining AI systems.

phrases: Your work will directly impact thousands of students
ensure that our tools meet their needs and set new standards for educational technology
ensure that our solutions meet learner needs
accelerate learning outcomes and efficiency for thousands of K-12 students
job_tasks.justification: The job description emphasizes understanding the needs of students and aligning technical solutions with educational goals and outcomes.

phrases: enhance user experience through AI
job_tasks.justification: This phrase highlights the application of AI to improve the user-facing aspects of the software.

phrases: Parameter-Efficient Fine-Tuning (PEFT) of LLMs
job_tasks.justification: While not explicitly stated, the context of experimenting with LLMs and creating features implies potential fine-tuning or adaptation of models.

phrases: building and maintaining production-grade security-aware user-facing software systems
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to the development of robust, production-ready applications.

phrases: Building Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) systems
job_tasks.justification: The description mentions creating interactive features with LLMs, which often involves RAG.

phrases: Developing complex agents with frameworks like LangChain, LangGraph, etc.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase points to building sophisticated applications using AI frameworks.

phrases: launching and iterating on products
job_tasks.justification: This implies deployment and ongoing maintenance/improvement of the developed applications.

phrases: gathering requirements
job_tasks.justification: This task involves understanding what needs to be built from a business or user perspective.

phrases: Surface-Level Coding: This is not a role for those who focus only on either front-end or back-end development. You will be expected to integrate both, creating comprehensive and scalable solutions.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly states the need for full-stack development capabilities.

phrases: Routine Maintenance: This role is not about maintaining legacy systems or making minor updates. You will be driving innovation and building new, cutting-edge applications.
job_tasks.justification: While it states what is NOT routine, it emphasizes building new, innovative applications, implying a focus on deployment and evolution rather than just maintenance.

phrases: Waiting for Detailed Specifications: You won't be handed fully fleshed-out requirements. Instead, you will take high-level ideas and translate them into fully developed products
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the need to interpret and translate business needs into technical solutions.

phrases: innovative thinkers
taking ownership of the entire product
Drive Technical Projects: Take ownership of the entire development process
take full responsibility for the quality and success of one's work

Collaborate and Communicate: Partner with a global team of developers, designers, and educational experts. Your ability to communicate complex ideas simply and effectively will be key to your success.

Working in Isolation: You won't be coding in a vacuum. Collaboration with other developers, product managers, and educational experts is key to ensuring that the solutions you build are impactful and user-centered.
Continuous Improvement: Stay ahead of the curve by continually learning and applying the latest advancements in AI and web development to our platform.
take high-level ideas and translate them into fully developed products
